::Hot Rod::

The 8 shots knocked Hot Rod to the ground, holes in his back.
"Awwwww! By the Matrix!" He pulles a grenade, and throwes it, so it
lands underneith Serge.

::Dimolition::

He looks at Havoc.
"We'll show them the true power of the War Machines! Yesss!"
He fires on Surge.

OOC: I'll be the first to appologize. Sorry, for accusing you of moding,
Soulstice. Lets just stop, and have fun. And if Soulstice isn't right,
just tell me, I'll get it right eventually.
